com.ibm.webest.gui.utils
Class ExceptionUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.webest.gui.utils.ExceptionUtils

public final class ExceptionUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for handling exceptions. It provides functionality to search for certain exceptions in the stack trace.

Author:
Gregor Schumm

Method Detail

getException

public static java.lang.Throwable getException(java.lang.Throwable trace,
                                               java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Throwable> ex)
Retrieves a exception of the given type from the given stack trace.

Parameters:
trace - the exception with the stack trace
ex - the type of the exception to search for
Returns:
the first instance of the found exception in the stack trace or null if it was not found

exceptionMatches

public static boolean exceptionMatches(java.lang.Throwable e,
                                       java.lang.String regex)
Checks if the message of an exception in the stack trace matches the given regular expression.

Parameters:
e - the exception with the stack trace
regex - the regular expression
Returns:
true if the given regular expression matches one message in the stack trace

getMessageFromException

public static java.lang.String getMessageFromException(java.lang.Throwable e,
                                                       java.lang.String defaultMsg)
Gets a user readable message extracted from the given exception.
Patterns and their replacement strings are defined in 'exceptions.properties'.

Parameters:
e - the stack trace to search
defaultMsg - a default message which is used if no matching exception is found
Returns:
the message string
